| History                 = Doom's Children was a conservative [[Latveria|Latverian]] politcal group led by [[Octavio von Bardas (Earth-616)|Octavio von Bardas]] who fought against the the opposing radical faction known as the [[Latverian New Prosperity Alliance (Earth-616)|Latverian New Prosperity Alliance]] during the civil war that plagued the small European country following [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]]'s abdication of the throne.

[[United States of America|US]] Presidential candidate [[Loki Laufeyson (Ikol) (Earth-616)|Loki]] indirectly caused the death of Octavio von Bardas after facilitating the Prosperity Alliance access to a secret weapons cache in [[Castle Doom (Doomstadt)|Castle Doom]].{{r|Vote Loki Vol 1 3}}
